Class MigrationsCliConsoleHandler

java.lang.Object
java.util.logging.Handler
java.util.logging.StreamHandler
ac.simons.neo4j.migrations.cli.internal.MigrationsCliConsoleHandler
public final class MigrationsCliConsoleHandler extends StreamHandler
Always log to stdout. Not for external use outside this program.
Since:
0.0.5
Author:
Michael J. Simons
